oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ||kabbo (Jantje) (II)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Baboons are eaten by some groups of |xam and other peoples (such as the 'Berg Bushmen', the 'Groot Rivier's Bushmen' and the Koranna). 1) This story is found in Book II-7.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The eating of baboons
